items.sentence: I think that there are a lot of good-looking men in Australia.
My boyfriend and I have been together for seven years already.
Tom and I were engaged for three months before we got married.
I never used to kiss Tom goodbye in the morning, but I do now.
A strange-looking man came up to me and started talking to me.
The woman sitting next to me on the bus started talking to me.
If you insist on doing it that way, I'm not going to help you.
I spent thirty minutes trying to convince Tom to come with us.
Tom walked up to the stranger and asked him if he needed help.
I walked over to Tom's desk and handed him a pair of scissors.
